admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
This is the Implementation Completion Report (ICR) for the Pharmaceuticals
Project in China. The objectives of the project were to: 1) Expand pharmaceutical production; 2) Improve the quality of pharmaceutical products; and 3) Improve the quality of training, maintenance, marketing and management in the pharmaceutical industry. All of the Project objectives were met. Overall, the Project is judged to be sustainable. Overall, there was a very strong commitment of the borrower and the project entities at all levels to meet the Project Objectives. The key lessons learned from the project were that experience from the Project again demonstrated the value of careful preparation and that the early involvement of local consultants in assisting in the preparation demonstrated that country specific factors are adequately addressed.
